Standing for Happy: Soda Pop Stop inÂ LA

04 Nov 2009

Awesome Video of John Nese, owner of Soda Pop Stop in LA. Best part is when he says “It’s rally bubbled water. If I was to define it in one word it would be happy…maybe smile.” He gets marketing and he’s completely authentic. He confidently says that the key is to “set yourself apart by providing your customers with something that no one else has.”

He’s got an opinion AND a spine. He rants on everything from Corn Syrup, Energy Drinks and Big Business. That’s what really sets him apart.
